edge: At the 50th National Film Awards, The Legend of Bhagat Singh won the Best Feature Film in Hindi and received recognition for its contribution to Indian cinema.
Ajay Devgn, who portrayed the titular character in The Legend of Bhagat Singh, received the Best Actor award at the National Film Awards and Filmfare Awards.
A. R. Rahman won the Best Background Score award for his music in The Legend of Bhagat Singh at the Filmfare Awards.
Kumar Taurani and Ramesh Taurani received the Best Film (Critics) award for The Legend of Bhagat Singh at the Filmfare Awards.
In addition to the Best Actor award, Ajay Devgn also won the Best Actor (Critics) award for his performance in The Legend of Bhagat Singh at the Filmfare Awards.
